title: Potato, olive and goat's cheese pie
ingredients: ['3 leeks, cut into chunks', '50g butter', '1 sprig fresh thyme', '500g Cyprus potatoes, peeled and chopped into thick slices', '10 green olives, stoned and halved', "140g goat's cheese, cut into small chunks", 'sea salt and black pepper to taste', '1 sprig marjoram', '500g pack shortcrust pastry', '1 egg, beaten']
